name: Into the TIMEVERSE
description:
is a hard non forgiving action platformer game.
The main goal of the game is to change color and land your ball on the appropriate platform, try to avoid all the hazards in your way.


  • Intense not stop action
  • 13 stages through 4 worlds
  • Boss
  • The ability to reverse time
  • Non linear gameplay through different pathways
  • 18 extra new challenge stages to test your nerves
  • Infinite Mode through 3 different themes
  • Time attack with ghost mode
  • Global steam leader-boards
  • A wide variety of player skins
  • Constant free updates
  • Ultrawide screen support

There are some mechanics that you must figure them on your own.
Into the TIMEVERSE is a game that you must lose to learn the stages.
Muscle memory is the main component for succeeding but the random element has a strong presence too.
You will encounter multiple paths in your way to the exit portal.
Expect to die a lot in this game.

We are planing to expand the game by adding new elements like new worlds,challenge stages,skins,game modes (ALL FOR FREE)
Happy gaming :)
